Text:
This movie is not good. 

The screen is shaking the whole time, if you see it in detail. It's very annoying.... 

Such a shame.

I noticed also that a part of the screen is missing, it's seems be cutted away above. 

You will notice it when you compare the 1080p screen with the 720p version.
